org.paces.stata

Class ColorTerp

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.paces.stata.ColorTerp

  • public class ColorTerp
extends Object
    Version:
    0.0.1-SNAPSHOT Class and methods used for color interpolation in Stata. To make testing a bit easier, the class includes a main method that provides a command line interface and prints the results to the console. The arguments for the main method are described in further detail at main(String[]). However, the primary method to interact with the class and methods should occur through the brewterpolate.ado Stata command, which acts as a wrapper around this class by accessing it through the Stata Java API. You can find additional information out about the Java plugin described here at the project repository, or by visiting the brewscheme project page or brewscheme repository.

    Examples

    // Interpolate 4 colors in RGB colorspace
    brewterpolate, sc("197 115 47") ec("5, 37, 249") c(4)

    // Interpolate 9 colors in the same color space and return the inverse of the colors
    brewterpolate, sc("197 115 47") ec("5, 37, 249") c(9) inv

    // Interpolate 3 colors in RGB and return the colors as grayscale
    brewterpolate, sc("197 115 47") ec("5, 37, 249") c(3) g

    // 5 Saturated colors as Web formatted RGB Hexadecimal strings
    brewterpolate, sc("197 115 47") ec("5, 37, 249") c(5) rcs(web) cm(saturated)

    // 5 Less saturated colors as Hexadecimal values with alpha parameter
    brewterpolate, sc("197 115 47") ec("5, 37, 249") c(5) rcs(hexa) cm(desaturated)

    // The inverse of 37 Colors that are arbitrarily brighter in HSB colorspace
    brewterpolate, sc("197 115 47") ec("5, 37, 249") c(37) inv cm(brighter) rcs(hsb)

    Author:
    Billy Buchanan
    See Also:
    Stata Java API.

      • rgbToHex

        public String rgbToHex(Double val)
        Method used to convert an RGB Integer value to a Hexadecimal string
        Parameters:
        val - A double valued RGB component value
        Returns:
        A two byte hexadecimal string. If the value is in [0, 15] the method will append the leading zero in the first position of the string (e.g., 11 in decimal becomes "0b" instead of "b").

      • rgbInt

        public Integer rgbInt(Double val)
        Method to transform double valued RGB component value to an Integer value in [0, 255]
        Parameters:
        val - The double value to convert to an RGB integer
        Returns:
        An integer value in [0, 255] based on the double value passed to the method.

      • getColorString

        public String getColorString(javafx.scene.paint.Color thecolor,
                             String cspace)
        Method to translate color object into a color string
        Parameters:
        thecolor - The interpolated color object
        cspace - The return color space
        Returns:
        A space delimited string of component values for the interpolated colors.

      • setTColors

        public void setTColors(javafx.scene.paint.Color s,
                       javafx.scene.paint.Color e,
                       double[] distances,
                       boolean brighter,
                       boolean darker,
                       boolean saturated,
                       boolean desaturated,
                       boolean invert,
                       String cspace,
                       boolean grayscale)
        Method to create a string array of RGB values given start and end colors and the distance between them.
        Parameters:
        s - Starting color object
        e - Ending color object
        distances - Array of distances between start and end
        brighter - A Boolean used to return brighter versions of interpolated colors
        darker - A boolean used to return arbitrarily darker version of the interpolated colors
        saturated - A boolean used to return arbitrarily more saturated version of the interpolated colors
        desaturated - A boolean used to return arbitrarily less saturated version of the interpolated colors
        invert - A boolean used to return the inverse of the interpolated colors
        cspace - The return colorspace to use for the interpolated colors
        grayscale - A boolean used to translate the color into a grayscale space

      • setPoints

        public void setPoints(String ptmacro)
        Method to set the points member variable of the class
        Parameters:
        ptmacro - A string passed to the method from Macro.getLocalSafe ("icolors");

      • interpcolors

        public static int interpcolors(String[] args)
        Constructor method for ColorTerp class
        Parameters:
        args - Arguments passed to the ColorTerp constructor (not used).
        Returns:
        An object of class ColorTerp

      • main

        public static void main(String[] args)
        Command line interface method
        Parameters:
        args - A string array containing :
        1. Input Color Space String
        2. Output Color Space String
        3. Starting Color String
        4. Ending Color String
        5. Number of points to interpolate
        6. Color mod argument (one of brighter, darker, saturated, desaturated, or "")
        7. Invert color (boolean string)
        8. Return colors as grayscale
